author: Natalia Cunningham

review: I did not know what to expect, but for only $30 I was willing to gamble with it. I am not the most tech savvy person, but that being said the instructions on how to set this up and use it were easy. I was watching steaming digitaltv within a short period of time.My only reservation is that I would like more streaming options on it. Netflix, and Hulu+ are the primary streaming options, both of which require paid accounts. There are many free legal streaming media outlets that Google could tap into.

review: Yeah, there's better media players out there.  Apple TV is better, Roku is better, building an HTPC is the best, etc...  but all of those are way, WAY more expensive.  For only $35, the Chromecast is exactly what we needed in the world to convert people into cable-cutters!  And with more and more apps supporting it, this is probably one of the best cost:quality ratio items I've ever bought.  Just pick one up and see for yourself!
